## Collector.\_simpleFactory() method

A simple factory method for derived classes which directly store the supplied object.

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected static _simpleFactory<TKEY extends string = string, TINDEX extends number = number, TITEM extends ICollectible<TKEY, TINDEX> = ICollectible<TKEY, TINDEX>>(key: TKEY, index: number, item: TITEM): Result<TITEM>;
```

**Returns:**

[Result](./ts-utils.result.md)<!-- -->&lt;TITEM&gt;

`Success` with the created item and a detail of 'success', or `Failure` with an error message and appropriate detail.
